scripts.coveralls: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.coverage: cross-env NODE_ENV=test LOG_LEVEL=0 nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --clean node node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -u bdd --recursive --colors test/
scripts.test: eslint --fix bin lib test && cross-env NODE_ENV=test LOG_LEVEL=0 mocha -u bdd --recursive --colors test/
scripts.diagrams: mmdc -i doc/blockchain.mmd -o doc/blockchain.png -b transparent && mmdc -i doc/components.mmd -o doc/components.png -b transparent
